mapper.select: SELECT media_introduce AS mediaIntroduce ,region AS region ,ad_category AS adCategory ,media_url AS mediaUrl FROM adgomin_media_introduce WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email}

SELECT media_order as mediaOrder ,ad_detail_category as adDetailCategory ,media_title as mediaTitle ,media_summary as mediaSummary ,media_detail_explain as mediaDetailExplain ,thumbnail_img_nm as thumbnailImgNm ,thumbnail_origin_file_nm as thumbnailOriginFileNm ,thumbnail_img_file_path as thumbnailImgFilePath ,media_price as mediaPrice ,media_submit_status as mediaSubmitStatus FROM adgomin_media_register WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email} AND media_order = ( SELECT MAX(media_order) FROM adgomin_media_register WHERE email = #{email} )

SELECT thumbnail_img_nm AS thumbnailImgNm ,thumbnail_origin_file_nm AS thumbnailOriginFileNm ,thumbnail_img_file_path AS thumbnailImgFilePath FROM adgomin_media_register WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email} AND media_order = ( SELECT max_media_order FROM (SELECT MAX(media_order) AS max_media_order FROM adgomin_media_register WHERE email = #{email}) AS sub )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM adgomin_media_register T1 LEFT JOIN adgomin_user T2 ON T1.email = T2.email WHERE 1=1 AND T2.user_order = #{userOrder} AND T1.media_submit_status = 'C'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM adgomin_media_register T1 LEFT JOIN adgomin_user T2 ON T1.email = T2.email WHERE 1=1 AND T2.user_order = #{userOrder} AND T1.confirm_notification_read = 'N'
SELECT T1.media_order AS mediaOrder FROM adgomin_media_register T1 LEFT JOIN adgomin_user T2 ON T1.email = T2.email WHERE 1=1 AND T2.user_order = #{userOrder} AND T1.media_submit_status = 'C';

SELECT refuse_reason AS refuseReason FROM adgomin_media_refuse_reason WHERE 1=1 AND media_order = #{mediaOrder} AND refuse_order = (SELECT MAX(refuse_order) FROM adgomin_media_refuse_reason WHERE media_order = #{mediaOrder})
